infos.value: ...How is this possible!?
How can you still fight with that broken body!?
Is this the best...Gouga has...to offer?
Do not mock us!
Ngh...!
Impossible... I pierced your heart! How are you still standing!?
Attack, now! Hold nothing back!
Lorei...la... I am...coming...
Excellent work, Niv'Lu.
But some of those sneaky Saiga shinobi got away...
It is only a matter of finding them now.
But before that, let us go to Saiga...
And reduce that filthy village to ashes.
Then hunt us some Saiga shinobi afterward.
Indeed.
Heh. My trigger finger is itching already!
With Saiga out of the way, Gouga will be the one to decide the course of war.
Then the world will be mine for the taking.
*Huff* *huff* *huff*
...It looks like we got away.
...Right.
I must return to Ovis...
But Ahlim, you're free now.
Understand what...?
The village is gone. There's nothing binding you to it anymore.
No.
I won't allow Saiga to fall!
Ahlim...
I will rebuild it, no matter what!
Haha. You really are incredible.
If you truly feel that way, I'll help you.
Livialle...
Until that time comes...we both must stay alive.
...Right!
Take care.
Okay. I'll give it everything I've got!
Soon after, a carriage is attacked by bandits on the border between Hourne and Leonis.
And in that carriage...is Mach√©rie, en route to be wed into Fennes.
